Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39325 affecting package telegraf for versions less than 1.27.3-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-39325 affecting package telegraf for versions less than 1.27.3-3. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package telegraf is earlier than 1.27.3-3, affected by CVE-2023-39325
